revised_title: Description of the Cavern of Bruniquel and Its Human Remains
tldr: The author, Richard Owen, describes the Cavern of Bruniquel in France and the human remains discovered there. He discusses the contemporaneity of the human remains with those of extinct animals and the flint and bone implements found in the cavern. The author also compares the skull and teeth of the individuals to different types, including the Celtic type.
